briefdescription.para: Test payload size in bytes (default 16 MiB).

detaileddescription.para: Can be overridden with the environment variable TEST_MMAP_BYTES.

briefdescription.para: Page-touch stride in bytes for the soft prefetch walk.

detaileddescription.para: Can be overridden with TEST_MMAP_STRIDE (default = system page size).

briefdescription.para: Create a temporary file of nbytes and fill it with a pattern.

parameterdescription.para: On success, receives an open R/W file descriptor.
Optional buffer to receive the path used.

briefdescription.para: Compute a simple rolling checksum over p for n bytes.
Verify the file pattern matches the expected formula.
Run the SEQUENTIAL/RANDOM advice and soft prefetch walk.

detaileddescription.para: This function does not assert performance; it only ensures the sequence of calls is valid and the mapping remains readable and correct.

briefdescription.para: Entry point for the mmap tuning test.

detaileddescription.para:
Environment variables:
TEST_MMAP_BYTES : total bytes to allocate (default 16 MiB)
TEST_MMAP_STRIDE : stride in bytes for the soft prefetch walk
Exit status: 0 on pass, non-zero on failure.
